nodes.text: Temple of Stalsinek is an adventure seed contained in the Star Wars Gamemaster Screen. Legends tell of a magical fountain on the planet Stalsinek IV that can restore limbs, cure disease and give youth. Jorkatt the Render offers a sum of money for someone to obtain a sample for him; but there is a price to pay for the water. Possible alternate storylines that could be adapted by a gamemaster were also included. It was written by Bill Olmesdahl.
